fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Jim Edwards; Russell Brunson, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: The website you're welcoming them to
The niche group of people you target (Singular)

fieldHint.hint1: (Ex: funnel hacker; ebook author (or those who want to be))

fields.fieldTitle: The niche group of people you target (Plural)

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: funnel hackers; ebook authors (or those who want to be)

fields.fieldTitle: The title of the free report you are giving away

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: The Insiders Guide to Make More Money With Marketing Funnels; 5 Keys To Creating Money-Making Ebooks Fast!, etc.

fieldHint.hint2: TIP: Use the Profitable Title Scripts to come up with great report title ideas

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: What is a marketing funnel and why do you need one?; Can you still make money with ebooks in today's market?
Ex: How do you "hack" a proven, money-making funnel without the trial and error?; Is Amazon Kindle's "Select" lending program a good idea or not?
Ex: How do you make the most money from every single funnel?; How do I get my ebook published?
Ex: What do you do if you're being held hostage by your webmaster or your tech guy?; How do you make money with an ebook?
Ex: What software do you use to set up a marketing funnel that doesn't take months to figure out?; How do you write an ebook quickly?

fields.fieldTitle: Big result wanted from this area of their life/business

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: make more sales and build up your audience FAST; sell ebooks for HUGE profit margins, etc

fields.fieldTitle: A BIG "how to" secret they really want to know!

fieldHint.hint1: "My audience really wants to know how to _______."

fieldHint.hint2: Starts with and includes the words "how to"

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: how to set up a money-making funnel in less than 10 minutes; how to create money making ebooks fast and easy, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What bribe do they get when they opt in?

fieldHint.hint1: "I am offering them a _____ to opt in to my list."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Free Video, Free Video Series, Free Report, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Big Prize or payoff of the free bribe you're offering

fieldHint.hint1: Complete the phrase: "We've created a [free report] for you that explains ____"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: the top 5 questions (and answers) about six-figure marketing funnels every online business owner needs to know ; the top 5 questions and challenges every aspiring ebook author faces AND how to overcome them

fields.fieldTitle: Big takeway or "reveal" you make on the next page (sales page?)

fieldHint.hint1: Complete the phrase: "Also, on the next page you'll get all the details about how you can immediately _____"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: start creating professional-level marketing funnels to sell anything; get started writing and publishing your own outrageously profitable ebooks

fields.fieldTitle: Sales Page / Affiliate Link URL of what you're selling
Title / Name of the what you ultimately want them to buy

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: ClickFunnels; The 7 Day Ebook, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Headline for the product / service / coaching / software, etc. you want them to buy

fieldHint.hint1: TIP: Use the headline from the target sales page.

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: How to write and publish your own OUTRAGEOUSLY Profitable eBook in as little as 7 days - even if you can't write, can't type and failed high school English class!
